translation.en: [Bella] "Some say the world will end in fire
From what I've tasted of desire I hold with those who favor fire
translation.ko: '나는 맛본 욕망에 따라 불의 편에 서리라'

translation.en: But if I had to perish twice
I think I know enough of hate
To say that for destruction ice
You know, I've got an English final.
Okay, I will if you marry me.
Where I'm from, it's the way one says, "I love you."
translation.ko: 내가 자란 시대에선 사랑을 표현하는 방식이야

translation.en: Well, where I come from, at my age,
translation.ko: 내가 자란 시대에선 내 나이에 결혼하는 건

translation.en: it's the way one says, "I just got knocked up."
So, you're worried about what people will think?
You know, two out of three marriages end in divorce.
Well, I think you'll find the vampire/human divorce rate
translation.ko: 뱀파이어랑 인간 커플의 이혼율은 모르긴 해도

translation.en: I have to be back at 4:00.
That kid trying to brown-nose me now or something?
He has a name. Now he's too punctual for you?
translation.ko: 걔도 이름이 있다고요 이젠 시간 맞춰도 탈이에요?

translation.en: You understand why you're being punished, right?
I know, I put you through hell.
But I have other reasons for grounding you.
translation.ko: 근데 외출 금지시킨 덴 다른 이유도 있어

translation.en: I just want you to get some separation from him.
translation.ko: 그 애하고 좀 떨어져 지내봤으면 싶어서

translation.en: Dad, there's nothing you can say.
So, all right, how about this?
if you use your new-found freedom to see some of your other friends, too, like...
translation.ko: 새로 얻은 자유 시간에 다른 친구들도 만나봐, 가령…

translation.en: He's going through a really tough time right now. His dad's really worried about him.
translation.ko: 요즘 힘들어해서 걔 아버지가 걱정이 많더라

translation.en: I remember when that was you.
[on voicemail] Hey, it's Jake. Leave a message.
[Bella] Jacob hadn't talked to me in weeks.
I wanted to fix it, he just... He wouldn't give me the chance.
translation.ko: 화해하고 싶은데 기회조차 주려 들지 않는다

translation.en: ♪ If just for tonight, darling Let's get lost ♪
translation.ko: "나도 보고 싶지만 바뀌는 건 없어, 미안해, 제이콥이"

translation.en: You're going down to the reservation.
Hey, did you do this to my truck?
Bella, you have to understand. -Your safety is everything to me. -[scoffs]
translation.ko: 벨라, 이해해 줘 내겐 네 안전이 1순위야

translation.en: Not intentionally, but the wolves have no control.
translation.ko: 고의로는 안 해치겠지만 늑대는 자기 통제가 안 돼

translation.en: Edward. I have until graduation to see him.
translation.ko: 에드워드, 기껏해야 졸업 때까지만 걜 볼 수 있어

translation.en: And then I'll be one of you,
-[Jessica] No way. Stop. -[Mike] Throw it away.

translation.ko: - 좋아 - 안녕 마침 잘 왔다, 잘 들어 봐

translation.en: [Mike] All right, check it out. All right. Let's see, we got.
translation.ko: 마침 잘 왔다, 잘 들어 봐 그래, 들어 보자

translation.en: Anything is possible, if you just believe."
-[Eric] Perfect. -And you got yourself a speech.
No, this'll be my speech when I want everyone to throw diplomas at my head.
You gotta embrace the cliches, Jess.
They are the bread and butter of all valedictorians.
Hmm. And that is why you are not valedictorian.
The speech is gonna be epic.
I've decided to throw a party.
After all, how many times are we gonna graduate high school?
translation.ko: 하긴, 고등학교 졸업을 몇 번이나 해보겠어?

translation.en: No one's ever seen their house.
Yeah. That's what you said last time.
-Hey, Angela. -Yeah? Do you need some help with those?
[Jessica] ...be sending money 'cause it's the polite thing to do, and then you'll be raking it in.
translation.ko: 예의로 돈을 보내겠지 그럼 엄청 모일걸

translation.en: [Mike] Wait a minute. People give you money?
I know you know what she saw. Tell me.
translation.ko: 앨리스가 뭘 봤는지 알잖아 말해 줘

translation.en: Just that everyone noticed how strange Alice is.
translation.ko: 다들 앨리스가 이상한 걸 눈치챌까 봐

translation.en: I think that ship sailed long ago.
[Edward] Their son went missing in Seattle over a year ago.
Charlie's doing what he can, but...
We've been tracking the situation in Seattle for a while.

translation.ko: 설명할 수 없는 실종이며 살인이 일어나고 있어

translation.en: If the situation gets any more conspicuous, the Volturi will step in.
translation.ko: 사태가 더 불거지면 볼투리가가 나설 거야

translation.en: If they go to Seattle, they could come here.
They could see I'm still human.
But we'll go to Seattle if we have to.
[Charlie] I'll fax these down, first thing.
It is still just you and I, right?
No, I'm just dropping her off.
Bella, my parents wanted to remind you about the airline ticket
translation.ko: 참, 벨라 우리 부모님이 네 생일에 주신 비행기 표 잊지 말라고 하셨어

translation.en: A round trip ticket to see Mom in Florida.
translation.ko: 엄마 보고 오라고 표를 끊어 주셨어요

translation.en: It expires soon, so you might want to use it this weekend.
translation.ko: 기한 얼마 안 남았으니 이번 주말에 써

translation.en: Well, I can't just drop everything and go.
translation.ko: 일을 다 내팽개치고 갈 순 없잖아

translation.en: It might be your last chance to see her before you graduate.
[Charlie] Well, might not be a bad idea.
Get out of town for a couple days. Get some distance.
translation.ko: 며칠 멀리 가서 머리 식히고 오던가

translation.en: Yeah, I wouldn't mind seeing Mom.
As long as you use the companion ticket.
[Bella] I did want to see my mom.
I wanted to know that her life was full and satisfying.
Can't you just feel the vitamin D soaking up in your pores?
translation.ko: 비타민 D가 모공에 흡수되는 이 느낌

translation.en: Yeah, I am gonna miss this.
You know, colleges in Florida are a lot sunnier.
translation.ko: 플로리다의 대학들이 날씨는 더 좋을 텐데

translation.en: I'm just saying, if you go to the University of Alaska,
They have a really great science program.
it's like he's willing to leap in front of you and take a bullet or something.
translation.ko: 네 앞에 뛰어들어 총도 맞아 줄 기세야
사랑에 빠진 거지 그 마음 안다

translation.en: I just want to make sure you're making the right choices for you.
translation.ko: 다만 널 위해 옳은 선택을 하는 건가 싶어서

translation.en: You know, 'cause you're the one that's gonna have to live with them.
translation.ko: 그 결과를 안고 갈 건 너니까

translation.en: All right, enough with the heavy.
I didn't want you to spend any of your money.
-Are these all our old trip T-shirts? -Mmm-hmm.
Get out! I saved them all.
I thought they'd make a good quilt, keep you warm up in Alaska.
But this one is my favorite, here.
This is amazing. Aw. Honey, I'm glad you like it.
I just figured, you know, when you get older, have kids, we can add to it.
translation.ko: 나이 들어 애들 생기면 조각보를 더 늘려가자

translation.en: Maybe go visit the world's largest ketchup bottle or something.
translation.ko: 세계 제일의 케첩 병 찾아 떠나도 보고

translation.en: Just thought you should have a little piece of me up there in Alaska.
translation.ko: 알래스카에서도 날 기억해 줄 뭔가를 주고 싶었어

translation.en: [Renee] Oh, honey, I miss you, too.
Are you sure this is where you saw her?
It was really great seeing my mom.
It doesn't have to be goodbye.
Is that why you asked me to go?
You thought I was gonna change my mind?
If I asked you to stay in the car, would you?
Yeah. To visit my mom. Why?
He's checking to see if you're still human.
Look, I'm here to warn you.
If your kind come on our land again...
Emmett and Paul had a misunderstanding.
[Jacob] Listen to you. Did you lie to get her out of town, too?
translation.ko: 이거 봐라 속여서 멀리 데려갔던 거야?

translation.en: She has a right to know.
She is the one the redhead wants.
I was trying to protect you.
Okay, we're gonna talk about this, but...
Why haven't you called me back?
Well, I have tons. Hold on.
Edward, you have to trust me.
Hey, lose the grin, Jacob. We're just going for a ride.
translation.ko: 그만 좀 좋아해라 잠깐 타는 거 가지고

translation.en: Are you sure this is a good idea?
I am the vampire girl, remember?

translation.ko: 응, 드디어 합류했지 정말 잘 왔다

translation.en: Maybe we can get a break from Jake's obsessive inner monologue.
"Maybe I should call Bella." "Maybe I should call Bella and hang up."
All right, you can shut up now.
Bella, this is Leah Clearwater, Harry's daughter.
Hey. I'm really sorry about your father.
If you're here to torture Jacob some more, feel free to leave.
translation.ko: 제이콥 더 고문할 거면 그만 가 줘

translation.en: I was wondering when we'd see your face around here again.
We're good. She won't be getting through our line any time soon.
translation.ko: 그럼, 당분간 우리 영역에 들어오진 않을 거야

translation.en: So when did Leah join the pack?
Around when her dad died. Her brother, Seth, also phased.
translation.ko: 걔 아버지 돌아가실 즈음 동생 세스도 그렇게 됐고

translation.en: He's only 15, one of the youngest we've had.
translation.ko: 세스는 겨우 15살이야 우리 중 제일 어리지

translation.en: Sam keeps him home studying, but he's chomping at the bit.
I wish it was Leah who'd stay home.
Come on, don't be such a guy.
No, it's not a chick thing.
It's, you know, a triangle thing.
We all have to live the Leah/Sam/Emily pain-fest.
translation.ko: 리아, 샘, 에밀리 신경전을 우리까지 느껴야 하거든

translation.en: So Sam dumps Leah for Emily?
Yeah, it wasn't like that. Sam hates himself for hurting Leah.
translation.ko: 그런 게 아냐, 샘은 리아에게 상처 준 걸 자책해

translation.en: I guess it sort of chooses you sometimes.
It's more than some crush, Bella.
Do I even want to know what that is?
All of a sudden, it's not gravity holding you to the planet.
translation.ko: 우릴 땅으로 끌어당기는 게 중력이 아니라

translation.en: Sounds like you know the feeling.
I just have a direct line to Sam's thoughts.
You knew this was gonna happen.
I mean, not before you've... You've even lived.
For a second, just a second, I thought...
But he's got his hooks in you so deep...
Better you really be dead than one of them.
translation.ko: 그들처럼 되느니 차라리 죽는 게 낫겠다

translation.en: I can't believe you said that.
Edward was right, I shouldn't have come.
You know, Edward could at least respect meal times.
translation.ko: 에드워드가 식사 시간엔 맞춰 보낼 줄 알았는데

translation.en: I'll just give you two some privacy, then.
Hey. Do you understand how worried I've been?
I almost broke the treaty to make sure--
I know I smell like a dog. -I'm sorry. -No, something's wrong.
translation.ko: - 개 냄새 나는 거 알아 - 뭔가 이상해

translation.en: [Dr. Cullen] Who was it? Someone we know?
This stranger, I didn't recognize his scent.
A passerby wouldn't have left Bella's father alive.
translation.ko: 그럼 벨라 아버질 살려둘 리 없죠

translation.en: The scent disappeared about five miles south of Bella's house.
I would have seen her decide.
I don't think it's the Volturi, either.
I've been watching Aro's decisions, too.
We'll also take shifts guarding Bella at her house.
You can't protect me, watch my dad and search for the intruder.
translation.ko: 절 보호하면서 아빠도 지키고 침입자까지 찾을 순 없죠

translation.en: I'm not leaving you here defenseless.
Well, I'm not gonna let you starve.
translation.ko: 널 굶어 죽게 할 순 없어

translation.en: And I wouldn't be unprotected. I have...
Whoever it was, he left his stink behind.
It'll be hard to miss when we cross it again. We'll handle it from here.
translation.ko: 다시 맡으면 감지해낼 수 있으니 여기부턴 우리가 맡지

translation.en: We don't need you to handle anything.
I could care less what you need.
translation.ko: - 네 생각 따윈 관심 없어 - 됐어

translation.en: I'm tired of this. From now on, I'm Switzerland, okay?
translation.ko: 정말 지친다 이제부턴 내가 중립 지대야

translation.en: but it wasn't about rivalry anymore.
It was about my safety, and Charlie's.
In the days that followed, I got them to at least try to work together.
translation.ko: 그 후 나는 두 집단이 협력하도록 노력했다

translation.en: The wolves took over so the Cullens could hunt.
translation.ko: 늑대들이 망을 보는 동안 컬렌가는 사냥을 갔다

translation.en: It wasn't exactly an easy alliance.
I'm good here. You should go.
I'm not gonna be gone long.
Don't rush. You need to hunt.
So, what do you wanna do today?
Bike, hike, just hang? Your call.
But we're going to a party tonight.
Are you sure this is okay?
I really hate being a party crasher.
Technically, you're a council meeting crasher.
You see? The council leaders, Dad, Quil's grandpa and Sue Clearwater.
translation.ko: 부족의 수장들이야, 우리 아빠 퀼네 할아버지, 수 클리어워터

translation.en: She took over for Harry when he died.
Okay, I should not be here.
I mean, they thought it would be good for you to hear the histories.
translation.ko: 저분들 생각엔 너도 역사를 듣는 게 좋겠대

translation.en: The tribe's histories? Aren't they secret?
We all got a role to play, and you're part of this.
translation.ko: 누구나 역할이 있잖아 너도 이미 일의 일부거든

translation.en: I mean, it's the first time Seth, Leah and Quil'll hear them, too.
But you are the first outsider. Ever.
translation.ko: 넌 이걸 듣는 최초의 외부인이 될 거야

translation.en: If I had known that, I would have, like...
Hey. It's about time you got here.
Paul's been hoovering the grub, but I saved you some burgers.
translation.ko: 폴 형이 싹 쓸어 먹길래 버거 좀 챙겨 놨어

translation.en: Bella, this is Seth Clearwater, Leah's brother.
-Come on, your dad's about to start. -Okay.
The Quileutes have been a small tribe from the beginning,
but we have always had magic in our blood.
shape-shifters that transformed to the powerful wolf.
translation.ko: 힘센 늑대로 변신하는 능력을 가지고 있었지

translation.en: This enabled us to scare off our enemies
One day, our warriors came across a creature.
translation.ko: 그러던 어느 날, 우리 전사들은 어떤 생명체를 만났다

translation.en: but it was hard like stone
Our warriors' sharp teeth finally tore it apart,
translation.ko: 우리 전사들이 날카로운 이빨로 갈가리 찢어놨지만

translation.en: but only fire would completely destroy it.
translation.ko: 완전히 파괴할 수 있는 건 불밖에 없었다

translation.en: They lived in fear that the cold man was not alone.
translation.ko: 우리 선조들은 그 냉혈인이 더 있을까 걱정했는데

translation.en: She took her vengeance out on the village.
translation.ko: 그 냉혈인의 짝은 우리 부족에게 복수를 했다

translation.en: was the only spirit warrior left
to save the tribe after his son was killed.
translation.ko: 영혼의 전사 중 홀로 살아남았다 그의 아들도 죽었지

translation.en: Taha Aki's third wife could see that he would lose.
translation.ko: 타하 아키의 셋째 부인은 남편이 패할 것을 예감했다

translation.en: The third wife was no magical being,
The third wife's sacrifice distracted the cold woman
translation.ko: 그녀는 자신을 희생하여 냉혈인의 주의를 흩뜨렸고

translation.en: long enough for Taha Aki to destroy her.
translation.ko: 그 틈에 타하 아키는 그 냉혈인을 죽였지

translation.en: Over time, our enemies have disappeared.
translation.ko: 그간 부족의 다른 적들은 모두 사라졌지만

translation.en: Our magic awakens when they're near,
We feel the threat in our blood.
and we must all be ready,
What did you do to me?
We'll find you someone to drink.
Just try not to get killed, will you?
Seattle is in a state of terror.
Police are baffled by the escalating murders and disappearances.
translation.ko: 살인 및 실종 사건 급증에 경찰도 당황한 가운데

translation.en: Theories range from a vicious new gang to a wildly active serial killer.
translation.ko: 신생 조폭이니 연쇄 살인범이니 의견이 분분합니다

translation.en: It's getting worse. We're going to have to do something.
translation.ko: - 지금까지 생방송… - 갈수록 태산이군 우리가 나서야겠어

translation.en: It takes more than one of our kind to cause the damage they're reporting.
translation.ko: 저 정도면 우리 종족 1명 짓이 아니에요
훈련도 안 되었고 조심성도 없는 게…

translation.en: In the first few months after the change.
That's when we're at our most uncontrollable. Vicious.
translation.ko: 가장 통제가 안 되고 악랄할 때지

translation.en: No one's trained these newborns, but this isn't random.
translation.ko: 훈련받은 흔적은 없지만 저절로 생긴 건 아니에요

translation.en: Well, now we're definitely going to Seattle.
And they've been created to fight someone.
We're the only clan even close to Seattle.
[Dr. Cullen] Regardless of why they were made, if we don't put a stop to them, the Volturi will.
translation.ko: 만들어진 이유야 어떻든 우리가 안 막으면 볼투리가가 해

translation.en: I'm surprised they've let it go on this long.
In Italy, I read Aro's mind.
He wants me and Alice to join him,
but he knows we'll never choose him as long as our family's still alive.
translation.ko: 우리 가족이 없어져야 그래 줄 거라 믿겠죠

translation.en: An army could solve that for him.
This kid, Riley Biers, disappeared over a year ago,
translation.ko: 이 라일리 비어스란 애가… 1년도 전에 실종됐어

translation.en: and his poor parents have been papering Seattle with these things ever since.
translation.ko: 가엾은 부모들은 이걸로 시애틀을 도배 중이고

translation.en: You think they should just give up?
Well, I wouldn't if it were you.
translation.ko: 만약 너였다면 난 절대 포기 못 한다

translation.en: [Bella] I have to figure out what to tell people.
Why I won't be home for Christmases,
why they'll never see me again.
After a few decades, everyone you know will be dead.
translation.ko: 몇십 년 후면 네가 아는 사람들 다 죽어

translation.en: Why are you so against me becoming like you?
translation.ko: 너처럼 되는 걸 왜 그렇게 반대해?

translation.en: I know the consequences of this choice you're making.
translation.ko: 그렇게 결정하고 나면 어떻게 될지 뻔하거든

translation.en: And to let you suffer that...
You believe I have a soul, and I don't.
translation.ko: 넌 내게 영혼이 있다고 믿지만 그렇지 않아

translation.en: But to risk yours, just for the sake of never having to lose you,
translation.ko: 널 잃기 싫으니까 네게 영혼을 버리라고 하는 건

translation.en: that's the most selfish thing I'll ever do.
I thought that you were afraid that I'd be too different.
translation.ko: 내가 달라질까 봐 겁내는 줄 알았어

translation.en: You know, like, I wouldn't be warm,
translation.ko: 변하고 나면 더 이상… 따뜻하지도 않고 체취도 다를 테니

translation.en: and I wouldn't smell the same.
So, Alice has planned a big graduation party.
translation.ko: 앨리스가 졸업 파티를 거창하게 열 건데

translation.en: I just wanted to do this differently.
But now I'm out of time.
You need to hear the truth, Bella,
that I'm in love with you,
and I want you to choose me instead of him.
translation.ko: 그 녀석 대신 날 선택해 줘

translation.en: I don't feel that way for you. I don't buy it.
translation.ko: - 난 너한테 그런 마음 없어 - 그런 말 안 믿어

translation.en: You feel something else for me. You just won't admit it.
translation.ko: 너도 나한테 감정이 있어 인정을 안 할 뿐이지

translation.en: Well, then you're not gonna have to fight for long.
You're rushing into it because you're afraid you'll change your mind.
You wouldn't have to change for me, Bella,
I can give you more than him.
translation.ko: 난 녀석보다 많은 걸 줄 수 있어

translation.en: I mean, he probably can't even kiss you without hurting you.
translation.ko: 녀석은 키스할 때도 널 다치게 할걸

translation.en: If you ever touch her against her will again...
Don't do this here! She's not sure what she wants.
translation.ko: - 이러지 마! - 벨라는 뭘 원하는지 몰라

translation.en: -Don't do this here! -Let me give you a clue. Wait for her to say the words.
[Charlie] Hey, hey, hey! Easy, guys. Easy.
Let's take it down a notch. All right?
Trying to walk and chew gum at the same time again, Bella?
I punched a werewolf in the face.
Badass. You're gonna be one tough little newborn.
Tough enough to take you on.
No sign of the intruder. But Victoria continues to make appearances.
translation.ko: 그 침입자 흔적은 없지만 빅토리아가 계속 나타나

translation.en: Go blather to someone else about the joys of becoming a newborn.
translation.ko: 뱀파이어 될 게 신난단 얘긴 다른 데 가서 해

translation.en: I don't understand what I did to make you hate me so much.
translation.ko: 내가 뭘 어쨌는데 날 그렇게 미워해?

translation.en: I don't particularly like you, but...
You have a choice. I didn't.
translation.ko: 넌 선택할 수 있지만 난 아니었거든

translation.en: None of us did. But you do, and you're choosing wrong.
translation.ko: 우리 모두 그랬어 근데 넌 잘못된 선택을 하잖아

translation.en: I don't care how miserable your human life is.
translation.ko: 네 인간으로서 삶이 얼마나 비참한진 상관없어

translation.en: I mean, it's not perfect. Nobody's life is perfect.
translation.ko: 완벽하진 않지만 완벽한 사람이 있나, 뭐

translation.en: There were things I still wanted,
to be married, with a nice house and a husband to kiss me when he came home,
translation.ko: 좋은 집에 살면서 퇴근한 남편의 키스를 받는 거야

translation.en: Royce King was the most eligible bachelor in town.
translation.ko: 로이스 킹은 마을에서 가장 인기 있는 남자였어

translation.en: But I was young. I was in love with the idea of love.
translation.ko: 그땐 어려서 사랑이란 감정 자체를 사랑했거든

translation.en: On the last night of my life, I left a friend's house late.
translation.ko: 내 생의 마지막 날 친구 집에서 늦게 나와

translation.en: Come over here! Here. Hold this.
Isn't she lovely, John? I told you she was a looker.
It's hard to say with all those clothes on.
What do you say, Rose? -Why don't we take off a few layers? -Stop it, stop it.
translation.ko: 어떻게 할래? 몇 겹쯤 벗어 줘 볼까?

translation.en: Hey, where do you think you're going?
-Come back. -Get off me! -Hey. You'll do as I say! -Let go of me! Stop!
They left me in the street, thinking I was dead.
translation.ko: 놈들은 내가 죽은 줄 알고 버리고 갔지

translation.en: Believe me, I wanted to be.
Carlisle found me. He smelled all the blood.
Thought he was helping me. I'm sorry.
translation.ko: - 날 돕는다고 한 게… - 마음이 아프네요

translation.en: I got my revenge on them.
Saved Royce for last, so he'd know I was coming.
translation.ko: 로이스는 마지막까지 남겨두고 공포에 떨게 했지

translation.en: I was a little theatrical back then.
Things got better after I found Emmett.
That's what I miss the most. Possibilities.
Sitting on a front porch somewhere,
I understand that that's what you want.
But there's nothing I'm ever gonna want more...
After you've been changed, there's one thing you'll want more,
translation.ko: 변화하고 나면 더 간절한 게 생기지

translation.en: What did I say about a low profile?
translation.ko: 내가 눈에 띄지 말라고 했나, 안 했나!

translation.en: Something bigger than any of us alone.
And if you can't control yourselves,
They've already drawn too much attention.
Others may begin to question the Volturi's effectiveness.
Maybe we should consult with Aro.
Either we let them do what they were created for,
When we were five, they asked us what we wanted to be when we grew up.
translation.ko: 5살 때 장래 희망이 뭐냐는 질문을 받으면

translation.en: Our answers were things like astronaut, president,
or, in my case, a princess.
When we were ten, they asked again.
or, in my case, a gold medalist.
But now that we've grown up, they want a serious answer.
translation.ko: 다 큰 지금은 현실적인 대답을 원하죠

translation.en: This isn't the time to make hard-and-fast decisions.
translation.ko: 지금은 확고한 결정을 내릴 때가 아니라

translation.en: This is the time to make mistakes.
Take the wrong train and get stuck somewhere.
translation.ko: 기차를 잘못 타서 엉뚱한 데도 내려보고

translation.en: Major in philosophy, because there's no way to make a career out of that.
translation.ko: 철학을 전공해서 취직 못 해 쩔쩔매도 보고요

translation.en: Change your mind, and change it again, because nothing's permanent.
translation.ko: 이렇게도, 저렇게도 해보세요 영원한 건 없으니까요

translation.en: So make as many mistakes as you can.
That way, someday, when they ask what we want to be,
Hey. What did you think of my speech?
Too easy-breezy? Too self-helpful? You hated it?
translation.ko: 너무 가벼웠나? 아니면 너무 자기 계발서 같았나?

translation.en: No. I think you pretty much nailed it. Yeah?
It's like I was born to lead, right?
translation.ko: 내가 리더십 하난 타고난 거 같지?

translation.en: I love this song! Let's go.
Was my right hook too subtle for you?
Look, Bella, I'm sorry about, you know,
I'd blame it on the whole inner animal thing, but it was really just me
translation.ko: 내 안의 늑대 탓을 하고 싶지만, 사실은…

translation.en: A graduation present. I made it myself.
They'll be here in four days.
This could turn into a bloodbath.
I didn't see anyone I recognized.
I know his face. He's local. Riley Biers.
translation.ko: 그 얼굴 알아 여기 애야, 라일리 비어스라고

translation.en: Whoever did is staying out of the action.
They must be playing with the blind spots in your vision.
[Jasper] Either way, the army is coming and there aren't enough of us to protect the town.
translation.ko: 그 군대에 맞서 우리끼리 마을을 지키진 못해

translation.en: They were passing around Bella's scent.
They're after Bella? What the hell does this mean?
It means an ugly fight. With lives lost.
No. You'd get yourselves killed. No way.
translation.ko: 안 돼 죽을지도 몰라, 안 돼

translation.en: It means more protection for you.
Jacob, do you believe Sam would agree to an understanding?
translation.ko: 제이콥, 샘도 이 결정에… 찬성해 줄까?

translation.en: As long as we get to kill some vampires.
Newborns won't know they even exist. That'll give us an edge.
translation.ko: 신생 뱀파이어들은 늑대 인간의 존재조차 모르니 유리하고요

translation.en: Fighting newborns requires knowledge that Jasper has.
translation.ko: 신생과 싸우는 법은 재스퍼가 알려 줄 거야

translation.en: All right. Name the time and place.
Jake, you don't know what you're getting yourself into.
You are the one who wanted us to get along. Remember?
translation.ko: 우리가 서로 잘 지내길 바라지 않았어?

translation.en: They don't trust us enough to be in their human forms.
translation.ko: 변신한 걸 보면 우릴 못 믿나 봐요

translation.en: He'll teach us how to defeat them.
They want to know how the newborns differ from us.
translation.ko: 신생 뱀파이어는 뭐가 다른지 알고 싶대요

translation.en: They're a great deal stronger than us
because their own human blood lingers in their tissues.
translation.ko: 자신의 인간 피가 세포에 남아 있어서요

translation.en: Our kind is never more physically powerful
than in our first several months of this life.
Carlisle's right. That's why they are created.
translation.ko: 그 말이 맞습니다 그래서 그들을 만든 거죠

translation.en: A newborn army doesn't need thousands like a human army,
translation.ko: 인간 군대처럼 몇천 명씩도 필요 없지만

translation.en: but no human army could stand against them.
Now, the two most important things to remember are, first,
translation.ko: 꼭 기억해야 할 두 가지 중 첫째…

translation.en: never let them get their arms around you. They'll crush you instantly.
translation.ko: 몸통을 팔로 감싸지 못하게 할 것 산산조각이 납니다

translation.en: never go for the obvious kill.
Don't hold back. Not in my nature.
translation.ko: - 힘 아끼지 마 - 그딴 거 안 키운다

translation.en: Never turn your back on your enemy.
Some of you are gonna get hurt.
Some of you could get killed because of me.
translation.ko: 죽을 수도 있어 나 때문에 말이야

translation.en: It's gonna be 100 times worse than this, right?
Are you sure there's nothing I can do to help?
Well, your presence alone, your scent, will distract the newborns.
Their hunting instinct will take over and drive them crazy.
translation.ko: 사냥하고 싶은 본능에 미칠 지경이 될 거야

translation.en: Hey. How do you know so much about this?
translation.ko: 있잖아 어떻게 그런 걸 잘 알아?

translation.en: I didn't have quite the same upbringing as my adopted siblings.
translation.ko: 난 우리 이복 형제들과 다르게 자랐거든

translation.en: All the training the Confederate Army gave me
Still, I never lost a fight.
This happened during the Civil War?
I was the youngest major in the Texas cavalry,
all without having seen any real battle.
Till I met a certain immortal.
I was riding back to Galveston
after evacuating a column of women and children
I immediately offered them my aid.
You'd better do it, Maria. I can never stop once I've started.
translation.ko: 네가 해라, 마리아 난 시작하면 도저히 못 멈추잖니

translation.en: You may be of great use to me.
They were very common in the South.
There were constant brutal battles for territory.
She was smart, careful, and she had me.
I was her second in command.
My ability to control emotions served her well.
translation.ko: 남의 감정을 조종하는 내 능력은 요긴했어

translation.en: An endless occupation since she never let them live beyond their first year.
translation.ko: 1년 넘게 살려두지 않아서 끊임없이 훈련이 이어졌어

translation.en: It was my job to dispose of them.
I could feel everything they felt.
I thought what Maria and I had was love.
But I was her puppet. She pulled the strings.
translation.ko: 꼭두각시였던 거지 그녀의 조종에 따를 뿐

translation.en: I didn't know there was another way
Now, she'd seen me coming, of course.
translation.ko: 물론 앨리스는 날 만날 것을 예지했어

translation.en: You kept me waiting long enough.
I don't know what I'd have become without her.
You never have to be that again.
[in English] I want you to do something for me.
translation.ko: 날 위해 해 줄 일이 있다

translation.en: Alice would have seen if she wanted to make an army.
and she's letting someone else decide.
translation.ko: 다른 누군가가 대신 조종하게 했을지도 몰라

translation.en: I'm not just gonna hide while you're out taking all the risks for me.
translation.ko: 너희만 나서게 하고 난 숨을 순 없어

translation.en: If it's Victoria involved, I need to keep you as far away from the fight as possible.
Jasper said that I could be of help.
translation.ko: 나도 도움이 될 거라고 재스퍼가 그랬어

translation.en: With the wolves in this, it's an easy win.
The rest of us aren't gonna have enough to do.
translation.ko: 나머지는 별로 할 일도 없을 거라고

translation.en: Okay. Either it's so dangerous that I have to hide
or it's so easy that you're gonna be sidelined. Which is it?
translation.ko: 쉬워서 일도 없다고 했다가 어느 쪽이야?

translation.en: It's dangerous for you, it's easy for us.
I think it's dangerous for us to be apart.
How many times do we have to prove that?
translation.ko: 대체 몇 번을 겪어야 깨달을 거야?

translation.en: I'll be worried. You'll be worried.
And we'll both be more vulnerable.
No, we both stay away together.
I can't make you choose between me and your family.
translation.ko: 나와 가족 중에 택하라고 할 순 없어

translation.en: The only way I can protect you is to be with you.
translation.ko: 널 보호하는 유일한 방법은 같이 있는 거야

translation.en: What, did you pull a muscle or something?
He's doing it for me, okay?
This field will give us an advantage in battle.
We need to lure the newborns with Bella's scent,
but it needs to end here.
Edward and I are going to a campsite.
Even if he carries me, they'll still pick up on our scents.
translation.ko: 날 안고 가도 내 냄새가 날 거야

translation.en: Dude, you really don't wanna start comparing stinks.
What he means is that your scent will mask mine if you carry me.
translation.ko: 네가 날 안고 가면 내 냄새가 감춰진단 거야

translation.en: This is not a good idea.
Edward, they won't want to get anywhere near his odor.
translation.ko: 놈들은 얼씬도 안 할걸 이 친구의… - 냄새 곁엔 - 일단 해 보자

translation.en: So you gonna ask me to sit out of the fight, too?
Or don't you care about my safety?
Of course, I care. But you'd say no.
translation.ko: 물론 상관있지 근데 넌 싸우러 갈 거잖아

translation.en: So I won't have a choice, anyways.
Since I let Sam be alpha male,
I gotta live with the shots he calls.
Since you let Sam be alpha?
I didn't wanna be in a pack, let alone be its leader.
translation.ko: 난 무리에 끼기 싫었어 대장은 말할 것도 없고

translation.en: But every choice has its consequences.
Some more than others. Don't start.
translation.ko: - 어떤 건 더 크지 - 말 꺼내지도 마

translation.en: Everybody makes choices. You're gonna have to accept mine.
translation.ko: 누구나 선택은 해 내 선택도 인정해줘

translation.en: But you can love more than one person at a time.
translation.ko: 한 번에 한 사람만 사랑하란 법 없잖아

translation.en: I've seen it. With Sam, Emily and Leah.
translation.ko: 난 본 적 있어 샘, 에밀리, 리아 말이야

translation.en: Well, I'm not a wolf. I can't imprint.
translation.ko: 난 늑대가 아니라 각인될 수 없어

translation.en: It has nothing to do with imprinting.
It has to do with feeling something for somebody.
And I know you feel something for me.
I can sense how I make you feel, physically.
I promised I wouldn't kiss you again till you asked.
translation.ko: 해 달라고 하지 않는 한 키스 절대 안 할게

translation.en: You're gonna be keeping that promise for a while, Chief.
translation.ko: 그 약속 잘 지키도록 해 추장님

translation.en: All I picked up was wolf stench.
Okay, Alice, don't be a stranger. Okay.
Your alibi for the battle is all arranged.
I told your father that our whole family's going camping this weekend,
so you and I are having a sleepover at my house.
You guys are on first name basis now?
Actually, you and Edward will have the house to yourself tonight.
translation.ko: 사실 오늘 밤엔 집에 너랑 에드워드만 남아

translation.en: We're all going hunting. Powering up for the battle.
translation.ko: 다 사냥 가거든 전투용 에너지 충전하러

translation.en: Why didn't you get remarried? After Mom.
translation.ko: 왜 엄마랑 헤어지고 재혼 안 했어요?

translation.en: Guess I still haven't met the right gal.
I thought you just maybe gave up on the whole institution of it,
translation.ko: 언뜻 보기에… 결혼 제도 자체를 부정하게 되셨나…

translation.en: But do you think there's any value in it?
It seemed to work out fine for her the second time around,
I mean, you definitely don't wanna have to get married because you weren't...
translation.ko: 다른 이유로 결혼하면 좋지 않잖니, 가령…

translation.en: Look, you know what I'm talking about.
There's things that you need to think about if you're gonna be physically intimate.
translation.ko: 육체적인 접촉을 할 땐 조심을 해야지

translation.en: Okay. Don't have "the talk" with me, please.
Well, it's just as embarrassing for me as it is for you.
And don't bother, 'cause Mom beat you to it like ten years ago.
translation.ko: 그리고 걱정 마세요, 엄마가 10년 전에 선수 쳤으니까

translation.en: Well, you didn't have a boyfriend ten years ago.
I'm sure things work the same way.
You guys are taking precautions and--
Okay, Dad, please, just don't worry about that.
translation.ko: 아빠, 제발 그런 건 걱정 마세요

translation.en: "Old school." Great. What's that? Like, code for something?
Oh, my God. Dad. I'm a virgin.
Ah... [gibberish] Okay! Good. Glad we covered that.
I'm liking Edward a little bit more now.
What are you doing outside? What's wrong?
It seems only fair that I be represented, as well.
translation.ko: 나도 정표를 주는 게 공평할 거 같아서

translation.en: I thought you might need one to sleep in.
I think an air mattress would have sufficed.
Okay, marriage is the condition for you to change me yourself, right?
translation.ko: 결혼을 해야 네가 날 변화시켜 준댔지?

translation.en: Okay. I wanna negotiate my own condition.
But you said that you wanted me to have every human experience.
translation.ko: 인간이 하는 건 다 해 보랬잖아

translation.en: Not ones that will risk killing you.
And everyone says once I'm changed all I'm gonna want is to slaughter the whole town.
translation.ko: 변한 뒤엔 살인 생각밖에 안 들 거래

translation.en: While I'm still me. While I still want you this way.
translation.ko: 아직 나일 때 이런 식으로… 널 원할 때

translation.en: I'll go to some ridiculously expensive college -and let you buy me a car. -[laughs]
translation.ko: 황당하게 비싼 등록금도 대주고 차도 사 줘도 돼

translation.en: Stop trying to take your clothes off.
I just want to be married to you first.
You really make me feel like I'm some sort of villain
trying to steal your virtue or something.
translation.ko: 꼭 네 고결함을 뺏으려 드는… 악당이 된 기분이야

translation.en: It's not my virtue I'm concerned about.
It's just one rule I wanna leave unbroken.
It might be too late for my soul, but I will protect yours.
translation.ko: 난 영혼을 잃었지만 네 영혼은 지켜주고 싶어

translation.en: I know that's not a modern notion.

translation.ko: 그 정도가 아니라 아예 태곳적 발상이야

translation.en: Things were a lot less complicated.
And if I'd have met you back then,
We'd have taken chaperoned strolls and iced tea on the porch.
translation.ko: 보호자 감시하에 같이 산책하고 정원에서 차도 마시고

translation.en: I may have stolen a kiss or two.
But only after asking your father's permission.
I would have got down on one knee...
and I would have presented you with a ring.
Isabella Swan, I promise to love you every moment of forever.
translation.ko: 벨라 스완, 영원히 그대를 사랑할 것을 약속하노니

translation.en: And would you do me the extraordinary honor of marrying me?
I told you how it works.

translation.ko: 컬렌가 사람들에겐… 특별한 힘이 있다고 했죠

translation.en: but they'll be able to anticipate your every move.
translation.ko: 놈들은 네 행동을 미리 파악할 수 있으니까

translation.en: Laurent found out about the things they could do,
But not before he told me.
translation.ko: 그 전에 내게 다 말해 줬지만

translation.en: I mean, this is supposed to be Cullen territory.
translation.ko: 내 말은… 이곳은 분명… 컬렌 영역인데

translation.en: We've been tearing it up and I've never even seen them here.
With my life. I'm just saying--
So that we can feed without their retaliation.
translation.ko: 배를 채우면서도 보복당할까 마음 졸이거나 놈들 공격 기다리며 떨면서 살 순 없어

translation.en: I can't live in fear anymore, waiting for them to attack.
translation.ko: 놈들 공격 기다리며 떨면서 살 순 없어

translation.en: I am going to end the Cullen clan.
If this is all I can contribute, I wanna be thorough.
translation.ko: 할 수 있는 한 최선을 다하고 싶어

translation.en: It's okay. Don't make yourself uncomfortable.
translation.ko: 별거 아냐 힘들게 이럴 필요 없어

translation.en: Since I spent 24 hours thinking you were dead.
translation.ko: 네가 죽은 줄 안 채로 꼬박 하루를 보낸 뒤부터

translation.en: Well, I didn't want to risk losing it.
I think we should wait to tell him. I mean, at least till after the fight.
translation.ko: 나중에 말하는 게 좋겠어 최소한 전투는 끝내고

translation.en: I just want him to have a clear head.
Alice says there's a storm coming.
I'll see you in a couple of hours.
Bunch of vampires trying to kill me.
You should get back before the storm hits.
You'll need my connection to the pack to keep tabs on what's going on.
Seth will spell me in the morning.
He's not happy about missing the action, but it'll keep him out of trouble.
translation.ko: 녀석은 못 싸워서 아쉽겠지만 다칠 일은 없겠지

translation.en: I should have chosen a site lower down.
I can't sleep with all that teeth chattering going on.
translation.ko: 이 부딪는 소리에 잘 수가 없네

translation.en: She may need her toes someday.
And let's face it, I am hotter than you.
translation.ko: 인정할 건 해 내가 너보다 뜨겁잖아

translation.en: If she gets sick, it's on you.
Faster if you took your clothes off.
Can you at least attempt to control your thoughts?
translation.ko: 생각을 자제하려고 시도라도 해 볼 수는 없어?

translation.en: I really get under that ice-cold skin of yours, don't I?
Are you doubting her feelings for you?
So picking through my brain's okay,
but letting me into yours, forget it.
translation.ko: 네 생각은 가르쳐 줄 수 없구나

translation.en: I know she's in love with you.
But she's in love with me, too.
She just won't admit it to herself.
I can't tell if you're right.
Then let me ask you something.
would you try to kill me?
But, no. I couldn't hurt her like that.
translation.ko: 그렇지만 아냐 벨라에게 상처 줄 순 없어

translation.en: So you'd just turn her into a blood-sucking demon like you?
I don't want that. I never wanted that.
translation.ko: 난 원치 않아 원한 적도 없고

translation.en: But you gave up too quickly.
If you'd stayed away another six months,
that I might be better for her than you are.
translation.ko: 벨라 상대론 내가 너보다 나을지 몰라

translation.en: I know you can protect her.
But you can give her a life, a human life.
That's all I want for her.
I'm not going to force her into anything ever again.
The last time I tried, it almost killed us both.
translation.ko: 지난번에 그랬다가 둘 다 죽을 뻔했으니까

translation.en: When you thought she was gone,
But I wouldn't wish it on anyone, Jacob.
translation.ko: 그 누구도 겪게 하고 싶지 않은 고통이었지

translation.en: This might sound odd, but I'm glad you're here.
"As much as I'd love to kill you, I'm glad she's warm."
translation.ko: 죽이고 싶긴 해도 벨라가 따뜻한 건 좋다?

translation.en: and you weren't trying to steal my reason for existing,
translation.ko: 네가 내 존재 이유를 탐내지 않았다면

translation.en: if you weren't planning on sucking the life out of the girl I love,
translation.ko: 네가 내 사랑하는 여자를 흡혈귀로 만들 생각이 없다면

translation.en: But she could still change her mind, you know.
Where's Jacob? Did he already-- Not yet.
He's checking to see if the woods are clear before he goes.
I'm really sorry about last night.
That couldn't have been easy on you.
It definitely won't make my list of top ten favorite evenings.
All ten I spent with you.
Number one is when you said you'd marry me, Mrs. Cullen.
translation.ko: 1위는 내 청혼을 받아 준 밤이고 컬렌 부인

translation.en: I at least want to hyphenate my name.
You can't do anything. I can, by going out there and killing something.
translation.ko: 네가 할 수 있는 건 없어 나가서 뭘 죽이든 해야지

translation.en: No! You're not thinking clearly! Don't do that!
translation.ko: 안 돼, 넌 지금 이성을 잃었어 그러지 마!

translation.en: Maybe I'll get myself killed and make it simple for you.
Because I don't wanna lose you.
I'm asking you to kiss me.
That should have been our first kiss.
She's close. I can hear her thoughts.
translation.ko: 그 여자가 가까이 왔어 생각이 들려

translation.en: She knew we weren't there, but she caught my scent.
translation.ko: 우리가 없는 걸 알곤 내 냄새를 쫓아왔어

translation.en: She knew you'd be with me.
Victoria's just using you to distract me.
translation.ko: 빅토리아는 내 주의를 돌리려고 널 이용한 거야

translation.en: In fact, she'll be glad she doesn't have to deal with you anymore.
Don't listen, Riley. I told you about their mind tricks.
translation.ko: 듣지 마, 라일리 사람 마음을 가지고 논다고 했잖아

translation.en: I can read her mind. So I know what she thinks of you.
translation.ko: 빅토리아 생각이 보여 널 어떻게 생각하는지

translation.en: She only created you and this army
translation.ko: 너와 군대를 만든 건 진짜 짝의 복수를 위한 거야

translation.en: to avenge her true mate, James.
translation.ko: 너와 군대를 만든 건 진짜 짝의 복수를 위한 거야 제임스라고

translation.en: That's the only thing she cares about. Not you.
translation.ko: 오직 그 생각뿐 넌 안중에도 없지

translation.en: Think about it. You're from Forks.
That's the only reason she chose you.
Riley. Don't let him do this to us.
You won't get another chance like this again.
You want me to feel the pain you felt when I killed James,
translation.ko: 내가 제임스 죽였을 때 느낀 고통을 돌려주려고

translation.en: when I tore him to pieces,
when I turned him into ash,
when I turned him into nothing.
[Dr. Cullen] The pack needs to leave. The Volturi won't honor a truce with the werewolves.
translation.ko: 늑대들을 돌려보내자 볼투리가는 협정 안 지켜

translation.en: Jacob. Hold on. Carlisle's gonna take care of you.
translation.ko: 제이콥, 곧 칼라일이 치료해 줄 거야

translation.en: The bones on the right half of his body are shattered.
Jacob, you idiot, I had it!
translation.ko: - 다 이긴 걸 왜 그랬어! - 리아!

translation.en: I need to set the bones before his accelerated healing kicks in. It's already starting.
translation.ko: 치유 능력 발동 전에 뼈를 맞춰야 돼, 벌써 시작됐군

translation.en: [Edward] We need to get him out of here. We're not gonna win a fight with the Volturi.
translation.ko: 피신시켜야 해요 볼투리가하곤 싸움이 안 돼요

translation.en: We'll take him back to Billy's.
I'll be there soon as I can.
It's okay. We got you. We got you.
I've never seen a coven escape an assault of this magnitude intact.
translation.ko: 이만한 전투에서 살아남은 가족은 본 적이 없는데

translation.en: It appears we missed an entertaining fight.
It's not often we're rendered unnecessary.
translation.ko: 우리가 무용지물이 되는 경우는 잘 없거든요

translation.en: If you'd arrived a half hour ago, you would have fulfilled your purpose.
We offered her asylum in exchange for her surrender.
You don't need to do that. She'll tell you anything you want to know.
translation.ko: 그렇게까지 안 해도 다 얘기할 거예요

translation.en: He said our thoughts weren't safe.
[Dr. Cullen] Edward, if the Volturi had knowledge of Victoria,
She didn't know what she was doing.
The Volturi don't give second chances.
translation.ko: 볼투리가는 두 번 기회를 주지 않아요

translation.en: Caius will be interested to know that she's still human.
translation.ko: 아직 인간인 걸 알면 카이우스 님이 재밌어하시겠군요

translation.en: It's been going on for a while.
Why did he have to butt in? I could've taken that tick.
Oh, give it a rest, Leah.
The worst is over. He'll be all right.
I gave him some morphine, but his body temperature will burn it off soon.
translation.ko: 진통제를 놨지만 체온이 높아 오래 안 가니

translation.en: I'll come back to set up a drip.
I guessed Edward would read my thoughts.
translation.ko: 에드워드가 내 생각을 읽었을 거 같아서

translation.en: He wasn't even mad at me.
He's not as perfect as you think.
Can we just not talk about that?
I'd rather get all the rebreaking done at once.
translation.ko: 뼈도 마음도 한 번에 부수는 게 나아

translation.en: Well, at least I know I did everything I could.
translation.ko: 그래도 최소한 할 수 있는 건 다 했네

translation.en: It wasn't easy making you admit your feelings for me.
translation.ko: 나에 대한 감정 인정하게 만드는 게 어렵긴 했어

translation.en: I only fought them because I knew they wouldn't change anything.
translation.ko: 그래 봤자 달라질 게 없어서 그랬어

translation.en: I'm exactly right for you, Bella.
It would be as easy as breathing, with me.
translation.ko: 나와의 사랑은… 숨 쉬는 것만큼 쉬웠을 거야

translation.en: You know how much I wish it was enough.
Yeah. It's a month before my birthday.
translation.ko: 그래 내 생일 한 달 전이야

translation.en: I don't need to be another year older than you.
translation.ko: 너보다 또 한 살 더 먹고 싶진 않아

translation.en: Alice said she could get the wedding together by then.
translation.ko: 앨리스도 그때면 식 준비 다 된대

translation.en: I've chosen my life. I want to start living it.
translation.ko: 이미 선택한 길인걸 빨리 가고 싶어

translation.en: And so you're gonna let Alice plan the whole thing?
The, uh, dress, the reception, the guest list.
I mean, who knows who she's gonna invite?
I just don't know why you're doing this.
You're trying to make everyone else happy,
but you're already giving away too much.
This wasn't a choice between you and Jacob.
translation.ko: 난 너와 제이콥 사이에서 갈등한 거 아냐

translation.en: It was between who I should be and who I am.
translation.ko: 내가 돼야 할 사람과 나 사이에서 갈등한 거지

translation.en: I've always felt out of step,
like literally stumbling through my life.
in your world, but I've also never felt stronger
translation.ko: 나 자신이 강하다고 느낀 것도 처음이었어

translation.en: So it's not just about me?
I've made a mess trying to figure all this out,
translation.ko: 이 결론을 얻느라 못 할 짓도 많이 했지만

translation.en: but I wanna do it right.
And I wanna tie myself to you in every way humanly possible.
translation.ko: 너와의 인연의 끈을 묶는 데 인간으로서 가능한 모든 방법을 써보고 싶어

translation.en: something a little more difficult first.
It's a good thing you're bulletproof.
